description: pink with grey on underside of hand-set; bar-bell shaped hand-set and cradle unit; grey push buttons in 2 rows across central portion of cradle; pink cord
text: Two crucial developments which revolutionized the development of the modern telephone was the breakup of the telephone monopolies and the rapid development of the plastics industry which afforded an endless stream of innovative forms and gadgetry, this unique barbell form being but one example.
title: "Graham" push-button telephone
